headline: Trump Tried to Scrap Anti-Bribery Law, New Book Says
abstract: The president asked administration officials to help kill the Foreign Corrupt Practices Act, according to a new book from two Washington Post reporters.
lead_paragraph: WASHINGTON — President Trump wanted to strike down a law that prohibits companies from bribing foreign officials, calling the ban “so unfair” to American companies, two Washington Post reporters recount in a new book.
keywords: A Very Stable Genius: Donald J Trump's Testing of America (Book)
